sentences.english: Reliance on any information provided herein is solely at your own risk.
sentences.chinese: 如若依赖此处提供的信息，你将承担所有的风险。

sentences.english: When nothing tempts you to stray.
Of course we help each other if necessary.
sentences.chinese: 当然，如若需要，我们必定相互帮助。

sentences.english: If each would sweep before his own door, we should have a clean city.
sentences.chinese: 如若各人自扫门前雪，那么我们的城市将会更加洁净。

sentences.english: Non respecting of this will result in a rejected leg.
sentences.chinese: 如若没有遵照机型限制要求，此航段将不会得到批准。

sentences.english: We often have to relearn a lesson forty or fifty times to really get it.
sentences.chinese: 我们如若真的学会一样真知得经历四五十变的打磨。

sentences.english: He collaborated with guitarists such as Joao Pernambuco and Laurindo Almeida.
sentences.chinese: 他与吉他手，如若伯南布哥州和劳林阿尔梅达。

sentences.english: Some people can easily produce everything they know on a test.
sentences.chinese: 如若做一份考卷，熟悉相关知识的人可以一挥而就。

sentences.english: As for the sample, which if you require, we shall is pleased to send you on request .
sentences.chinese: 如若你司需要样品，请赐函，定按照你司要求寄上。

sentences.english: I haven’t run much here in London but when I have, it’s beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 我未曾跑遍伦敦各地，但如若成行，想必很是美妙。

sentences.english: Such as if have no you, your concession, I bathe small talk favorably your lofty and conscientious symbol.
sentences.chinese: 如若没有你，你退让，我沐小小赞扬你高风亮节。

sentences.english: Lord, let me never, never, outlive my love for thee.
sentences.chinese: 主，我莫苟且偷生，如若对你爱减退。

sentences.english: If not, I hope you said goodbye to him when he left this morning.
sentences.chinese: 如若不然，我希望在今天早上他离开时你有跟他道别。

sentences.english: If we can't, then India has to be a naysayer for a bad climate agreement.
sentences.chinese: 如若不然，则印度要对不公平的气候协议说不。

sentences.english: If the pain persists for more than four weeks, see your physician.
sentences.chinese: 如若疼痛持续四周以上，就得去看到医生。

sentences.english: If you are photosensitive, you may develop a rash.
sentences.chinese: 如若对光敏感的话，使用此类产品则会是皮肤出疹。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
in case (sth happens)/if/once (sth happens, then...)/when/in a short time/in one day
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
key information/instructions/it must be borne in mind
were it not for/if not for
